days.text: Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Haze during the day. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 easterly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling. Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, becoming force 5 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling slightly. Mainly cloudy. Light rain at first. Force 4 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
